Awesome looking game!

However, at the second stage, the targeting reticule is frozen in place. Running as admin, tried different resolutions.. nothing is helping.
can i trust paul.dll crack (is this a false positive)

The 2nd stage works with a controller, same for stages 4 and 5. I think the control config is messed up, even with 2 players WASD controls both players.

Anyone know if this is a problem with the real game?

Crazy as it seems , the mouse wont work after level 1 indeed ?!?!!?
I have spend  a lot of time trying to get a Trustmaster dual  analog control pad working with this game when configured with the  TocaEdit Xbox 360 controller emulator. But now the fire button starts the 2 player game when pressed. , and I cant find a way to solve it.
Anyone knows how?
THX in advance.
Well,same issue..btw how do I run in full screen mode?
good game. I wish that more than 1st stage were playable
